Articles.Content:
yupyup, more steps to interplanetary. Behold the beginnings of the Koyuz 1

> 
> Forgot to grab a screenie of the base, oh well
> 
> ![nKSLiNe.png](http://i.imgur.com/nKSLiNe.png)
> 
> ![ovJXztQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/ovJXztQ.png)
> 
> Remember kids, always keep drone cores on your transfer stages
> 
> ![JmDlqpA.png](http://i.imgur.com/JmDlqpA.png)
> 
> And finally the solar array (it gets +450EC/s with half the panels outside the sunlight)
> 
> ![ZFD4VpY.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZFD4VpY.png)
> 
> 

Next are the fuel depots and then I can finally get started on my moho mission!
This report of a mission has been moved to Mission Reports.
